---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** ayam ukta-lakṣaṇaḥ
prabodho bhakti-miśreṇa jñānena yatamānasya bhavatīti tat-sādhanam
āha---ya iti \|\|9\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.10 \|\|**

**parityakta-guṇaḥ samyag darśano viśadāśayaḥ \|**

**śāntiṁ me samavasthānaṁ brahma kaivalyam aśnute \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** bhavatu manaḥ prasannam, tataḥ
kiṁ ? tatrāha \| yarhi viśadāśayaḥ prasanna-manās tadā parityakta-guṇaḥ
san samyag darśano bhūtvā śāntim aśnute \| śāntim evāha---mama
samyag-audāsīnyena **avasthā**nam eva brahma**,** tad eva kaivalyam
aśnute \|\|10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** bhavatu manaḥ prasannaṁ
tataḥ kiṁ tatrāha---yarhīti \|\|10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** māṁ samavasthānaṁ
śakty-ādy-aviśiṣṭatayāvirbhāva-viśeṣaḥ, tad eva brahma **kaivalyam
a**śnute anubhavati \|\|10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : [+++]{.mark}**

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.11 \|\|**

**udāsīnam ivādhyakṣaṁ dravya-jñāna-kriyātmanām \|**

**kūṭa-stham imam ātmānaṁ yo vedāpnoti śobhanam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** samyag-darśanam evāha---udāsīnam
evātmānaṁ dravya-jñāna-kriyātmanāṁ deha-jñāna-karmendriya-manasām
adhyakṣam iva sthitam ātmānaṁ yo veda \|\|11\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atra
viśvanāthaḥ---adhyakṣaṁ jīvātmānamudāsīnam iva teṣvanāsaktam iva yo veda
sa imaṁ kūṭasthamātmānaṁ paramātmānaṁ veda yaḥ paramātmānaṁ veda
so\'bhavaṁ mokṣaṁ prāpnotyāvṛttyānvayaḥ \| śobhanam iti pāṭhe\'pi sa
evārthaḥ \| atrevakāreṇa samyagudāsīnatvābhāve\'pi sādhanadaśāyāṁ
jñānasiddhiṁ sūcayati \|\|11\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** kevalam eva darśayati---udāsīnam
iti \| adhyakṣam iva sthitam apy udāsīnaṁ yo vedety anvayaḥ, abhavaṁ
mokṣam iti sambandhoktiḥ, so'bhayam iti citsukhaḥ, śobhanam iti gauḍīyaḥ
pāṭhaḥ \|\|11\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** samyag-darśanam
evāha---dravya-jñāna-kriyātmanām adhibhūtādhidaivādhyātma-manasām
adhyakṣam jīvātmānam udāsīnam iva teṣv anāsaktam iva yo veda, sa imaṁ
kūṭastham ātmānaṁ veda, yaḥ paramātmānaṁ veda, sa abhavaṁ prāpnotīty
āvṛtānvayaḥ \| atreva-kāreṇa samyag-udāsīnatvābhāve'pi sādhana-daśāyāṁ
jñāna-siddhiṁ sūcayati \|\|11\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.12 \|\|**

**bhinnasya liṅgasya guṇa-pravāho**

**dravya-kriyā-kāraka-cetanātmanaḥ \|**

**dṛṣṭāsu sampatsu vipatsu sūrayo**

**na vikriyante mayi baddha-sauhṛdāḥ \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

jīvād bhinnasya manaso guṇāḥ sattvādayo matāḥ \|

> taj jñātvā na vikurvīta sva-svarūpaṁ manas tathā \|\| iti ṣāḍguṇye
> \|\|12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** saṁsāriṇaḥ kathaṁ kūṭasthatvam ?
ata āha---**bhinnasya liṅgasya** dehasya **guṇa-pravāhaḥ** saṁsāraḥ \|
bhinnatve hetuḥ---**dravyādy-ātmakasya** \| tatra cetanā cid-ābhāsaḥ \|
ato **dṛṣṭāsu prāptāsu** harṣa-śokādibhir **na vikriyante** \|\|12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atrākṣipati---saṁsāriṇa
ity-ādinā \| dravyādyātmakasyādhibhūtādhyātmādhidaivabuddhyātmakasya \|
tatra dravyādiṣu cetanābuddhiścidābhāsaś ca yato
buddhyādyātmaliṅgadehasyaiva saṁsāro\'to hetoḥ
harṣaśokādīnāmātmadharmatvābhāvād ity arthaḥ \|
ayamarthaḥ---liṅgadehasya khalvabhimānenaiva jīvasya saṁsāro na
tvaudāsīnyeneti \| tatrādhyakṣatve\'pi na jīvasya kṣatirliṅgasyāpi tad
eva liṅgatvam iti \| evañca yaḥ svadharmeṇa ity-ādinā bhakti-miśreṇa
jñānena yatamānānāṁ saṁsārābhāvamuktvākeṣāṁcitkevalayaiva bhaktyā
jarayatyāśu yā kośam ityaktanyāyena saṁsāranivṛttaye yatamānānām api
saṁsārābhāvam āha---dṛṣṭāsv iti \| āsakty-abhāvātprākṛtasampadvipadorna
vikriyante \| āsakty-abhāve hetuḥ---mayi badveti \| sauhṛdabaddhatvaṁ tu
kevalayaiva bhaktyā bhavedityāpāditaṁ tṛtīya-skandhe \|\|12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** atha bhakti-pakṣeṇāpi taṁ
sāntvayati---bhinnasyeti \|\|12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu dravyādīnām
adhyakṣatve'pi jīvasya teṣv evodāsīnya-mātra eva kathaṁ saṁsārābhāva ity
ata āha---bhinnasya jīvād anyasya liṅga-dehasyaiva guṇa-pravāhaḥ
saṁsāraḥ \| bhinnatve hetuḥ---dravyādy-ātmakasya \|
adhibhūtādhyātmādhidaiva-buddhy-ādi-svarūpasya \| ayam
arthaḥ---liṅga-dehe khalv abhimānenaiva jīvasya saṁsāro, na tv
audāsīnyeneti tatrādhyakṣatve'pi na jīvasya kṣatir liṅgasyāpi tatra
cetanā cid-ābhāsaḥ \| ato dṛṣṭāsu prāptāsu \| harṣa-śokādibhir na
vikriyante \|\|12\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.13 \|\|**

**samaḥ samānottama-madhyamādhamaḥ**

**sukhe ca duḥkhe ca jitendriyāśayaḥ \|**

**mayopakḷptākhila-loka-saṁyuto**

**vidhatsva vīrākhila-loka-rakṣaṇam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tvaṁ ca sūrirataḥ sukhe duḥkhe
ca samaḥ san samānā uttama-madhyamādhamā yasya \| jitānīndriyāṇy āśayaś
ca yena \| sa tvam akhila-loka-rakṣaṇaṁ vidhatsva \| katham ekena mayā
rakṣaṇaṁ kartuṁ śakyam ? tatrāha---mayeśvareṇopakḷptāḥ saṁpāditā
ye'khilā lokā amātyādayas taiḥ saṁyutaḥ \|\|13\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** sūrirmayi baddhasauhṛda
ityato mannideśa eva vartasvetyāha \| ataḥ sūritvāt \|
kathamityupaśaṅkate \| tatrāśaṅkāyām \|
īśvaradattaiśvaryo\'hamīśvarājñāpālana-rūpaṁ prajārakṣaṇaṁ karomīti
buddhyety arthaḥ \|\|13\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** atha kartavyam upadiśati sama iti
\| lokety atra sattveti citsukhaḥ \|\|13\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tvaṁ ca mayi
baddha-sauhṛda ity ato man-nideśa eva vartasvety āha---sama iti
caturbhiḥ \| prākṛta-sampad-vipadoḥ sama-buddhiḥ \| samānāḥ
sattvādi-guṇair uttama-madhyamādhamā yasya saḥ \| mayeśvareṇopakḷptāḥ
sampāditāḥ ye'khila-lokā amātyādayas taiḥ saṁyutaḥ \|
īśvara-dattaiśvaryo'ham īśvarājñā-pālana-rūpaṁ prajā-rakṣaṇaṁ karomīti
buddhyety arthaḥ \|\|13\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.14 \|\|**

**śreyaḥ prajā-pālanam eva rājño**

**yat sāmparāye sukṛtāt ṣaṣṭham aṁśam \|**

**hartānyathā hṛta-puṇyaḥ prajānām**

**arakṣitā kara-hāro'gham atti \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** nanu rakṣaṇaṁ daṇḍādi-sāpekṣam,
atas tapo'nyad vā puṇyaṁ kariṣyāmīti cet, ata āha---śreya iti \| yad
yasmāt sāmparāye para-loke prajābhiḥ kṛtāt sukṛtāt ṣaṣṭham aṁśaṁ hartā
harati \| arakṣaṇe doṣam āha \| anyathā prajābhir hṛtaṁ puṇyaṁ yasya sa
prajānām agham atti pāpaṁ bhuṅkte \| anyathety asya vivaraṇam,
kara-hāraḥ sann arakṣitā cet \|\|14\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atrākṣipati nanv iti \|
ādinā karādigrahaḥ \| saṁparāyaḥ samīpe syād āpaduttarakālyoḥ \|
paraloke mahaiśvarye ity abhidhānāt \| evakāreṇānyayogo vyavacchidyate
\|\|14\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** anyasyāpi rājñaḥ
prajā-pālanam eva dharma ity āha---sāmparāye para-loke prajānāṁ sukṛtāt
hartā gṛhītā \|\|14\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.15 \|\|**

**evaṁ dvijāgryānumatānuvṛtta-**

**dharma-pradhāno'nyatamo'vitāsyāḥ \|**

**hrasvena kālena gṛhopayātān**

**draṣṭāsi siddhān anurakta-lokaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** evaṁ ca mokṣo'py anāyāsena
bhaviṣyatīty āha---dvijāgryāṇām anumataś cāsāv anuvṛttaś ca
paramparā-prāpto yo dharmaḥ sa eva pradhānam artha-kāmau tu prāsaṅgikau
yasya \| anyatamo'tiśayenānyaḥ \| dharmādiṣv anāsakta ity arthaḥ \|
aikapadya-pāṭhe dharma-pradhānāv anyatamāv artha-kāmau yasyety arthaḥ \|
asyāḥ pṛthivyā avitā san alpena kālena gṛhāgatān sanakādīn drakṣyasi \|
anurakto loko yasmin saḥ \|\|15\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** dvijāgryāṇāṁ
śāstrābhijñaviprāṇāmanumatastairanujñātaḥ \| ity artha iti \| tamabatra
prakṛṣṭārthe na tu ḍatama iti bhramitavyaṁ tasyānupayogād iti bhāvaḥ \|
ity artha iti \| itthaṁ bahuvrīhiṁ kṛtvā punar dvijāgrairanumataḥ sa
cāsau pravṛttaśceti dharmapradhānānyatamaśceti karmadhārayaḥ kārya iti
bhāvaḥ \|\|15\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** uttara-kāle tasya
sva-bhakti-niṣṭhāṁ sva-bhakteṣu vikhyāpayitum icchayā anyeṣu
jñānādi-pravartanecchayā ca tasya kartavyaṁ sūcayati---evam iti
\|\|15\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** dvijāgryaiḥ
śāstrābhijñair viprair anumato'tha cānuvṛttaḥ paramparā-prāpto dharma
eva pradhānaṁ yasya saḥ \| anyatamas tatrānāsaktaḥ aikapadya-pāṭhe
karmadhārayaḥ \| asyāḥ pṛthivyāḥ \|\|15\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.16 \|\|**

**varaṁ ca mat kañcana mānavendra**

**vṛṇīṣva te'haṁ guṇa-śīla-yantritaḥ \|**

**nāhaṁ makhair vai sulabhas tapobhir**

**yogena vā yat sama-citta-vartī \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** mat mattaḥ sakāśāt kiñcid varaṁ
vṛṇīṣva \| guṇāḥ śamādayaḥ, śīlaṁ nirmatsaratvādi-svabhāvaḥ, tair ahaṁ
mantrito vaśīkṛtaḥ \| tad-rahitais makhādibhir nāhaṁ sulabhaḥ \| yataḥ
samaṁ cittaṁ yeṣāṁ teṣv eva vartituṁ śīlaṁ yasya so'ham \|\|16\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atyanukampāvigatadhairya
āha---varaṁ ceti \| mānavendretyuktyā devendratvaṁ tu yajñasyaiva
tiṣṭhatvato\'nyaṁ varaṁ mattaḥ kaṁcana vṛṇīṣvetyabhiprāyaḥ \| samatvaṁ
cātra---

> nārāyaṇaparāḥ sarve na kutaścana bibhyati \|
>
> svargāpavarganarakeṣvapi tulyārthadarśinaḥ \|\|

ity uktarītyā bhaktyuttham eva grāhyaṁ na rodhayati māṁ yogaḥ
ityādyuktaryogādyuttham iti sandarbhaḥ \| viśvanāthastu---samaṁ tulyam
eva sarveṣāṁ cittavartī cittādhiṣṭhātā sarvatrodāsīna eva na tu kasyāpi
vaśa ity āha \| same nirdoṣaṁ hi samaṁ brahma iti śrīgītokterbrahmaṇi
cittaṁ yeṣāṁ te samacittā jñāninas tatra vartī priyo hi
jñānino\'tyarthamahaṁ sa ca mama priyaḥ iti śrīmukhokteḥ \|\|16\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** sampraty api pūrvecchayāha---varaṁ
ceti \| guṇa-śīle atra bhakty-utthe eva jñeye \| tatra guṇāḥ
gurūpasatti-prāptāḥ pāṇḍity-ādayaḥ \| śīlaṁ tu susvabhāvo vinayādiḥ,
samatvaṁ ca, nārāyaṇa-parāḥ sarve \[bhā.pu. 6.17.28\] ity-ādi-rītyā
tad-uttham eva, na tu yogādy-utthāni tāni \| na rodhayati māṁ yogaḥ
\[bhā.pu. 11.12.1\] ity-ādeḥ \|\|16\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** atyanukampayā
vigata-gāmbhīrya āha---varaṁ ceti \| guṇa-śīlābhyām tābhyām
vaśīkārāsambhavād aprākṛte te bhakty-utthe eva jñeye \| guṇo
dayā-kṣamādiḥ, śīlaṁ vinaya-snehādi-mayaḥ svabhāvaḥ \| nāham iti---na
rodhayati māṁ yogaḥ \[bhā.pu. 11.12.1\] ity-ādeḥ \| yad yasmāt samaṁ
tulyam eva sarveṣāṁ citta-vartī cittādhiṣṭhātā sarvatrodāsīna eva, na tu
kasyāpi vaśa ity arthaḥ \|\|16\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.17 \|\|**

**maitreya uvāca---**

**sa itthaṁ loka-guruṇā viṣvaksenena viśva-jit \|**

**anuśāsita ādeśaṁ śirasā jagṛhe hareḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī
(sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tad evaṁ śrī-bhagavata ādeśa-tr
ayaṁ jātam indreṇa prītiḥ siddhānugamanaṁ yātrā-svīkāraś ceti \| tad eva
trayam api svīcakārety āha---sa ittham iti \|\|17\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.18 \|\|**

**spṛśantaṁ pādayoḥ premṇā vrīḍitaṁ svena karmaṇā \|**

**śata-kratuṁ pariṣvajya vidveṣaṁ visasarja ha \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

āyāsa-duḥkha-vrīḍādīn prāyaśaḥ sukhino'pi tu \|

> niyamād ṛṣi-bhūteṣu mohāyādarśayan surāḥ \|\| iti brahma-tarke
> \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kṣamāpayituṁ pādayoḥ spṛśantam
\| svena karmaṇā'śvāpaharaṇena vrīḍitam \| premṇā pariṣvajya \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** viśvajitsamastajetā pṛthuḥ
\|\|17-18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tatrāntima-dvayaṁ svānukūlena
prakāra-viśeṣeṇa prathamaṁ tu yathāvad eva svīcakārety āha---spṛśantam
iti premṇeti \| parama-premāspadatvena śrī-bhagavatā svayaṁ melitatvād
iti bhāvaḥ \|\|18\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** svenāśvāpaharaṇena
\|\|18\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.19-20 \|\|**

**bhagavān atha viśvātmā pṛthunopahṛtārhaṇaḥ \|**

**samujjihānayā bhaktyā gṛhīta-caraṇāmbujaḥ \|\|**

**prasthānābhimukho'py enam anugraha-vilambitaḥ \|**

**paśyan padma-palāśākṣo na pratasthe suhṛt satām \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : bhagavān**
**prasthānābhimukho'py** **anugraheṇa vilambitaḥ** san **na pratasthe**
prayāṇaṁ na kṛtavān iti dvayor anvayaḥ \| kathaṁ-bhūtaḥ ? **upahṛtam**
arpitam **arhaṇaṁ** yasmai \| **samujjihānayā** samudgacchantyā
vardhamānayā **bhaktyā gṛhīte caraṇāmbuje** yasya \|\|19\|\|
**padma-palāśavad akṣiṇī** yasya tathābhūtaḥ san \| **enaṁ** pṛthuṁ
paśyan \|\|20\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : atha** ubhayor
melanānantaram \|\| yātrā prayāṇaṁ prasthānaṁ gamanaṁ calanaṁ gatiḥ ity
abhidhānāt \|\|19-20\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : bhagavān
prasthānābhimukho'py anugraheṇa vilambitaḥ** san **na pratasthe**
prayāṇaṁ na kṛtavān iti dvayor anvayaḥ \| kathaṁ-bhūtaḥ ? **upahṛtam**
arpitam **arhaṇaṁ** yasmai \| **samujjihānayā** samudgacchantyā
vardhamānayā **bhaktyā gṛhīte caraṇāmbuje** yasya \|\|19-20\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.21 \|\|**

**sa ādi-rājo racitāñjalir hariṁ**

**vilokituṁ nāśakad aśru-locanaḥ \|**

**na kiñcanovāca sa bāṣpa-viklavo**

**hṛdopaguhyāmum adhād avasthitaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** bhagavatas tat-kṛpātirekam uktvā
tasya bhakty-udrekam āha---sa iti dvābhyām \| **bāṣpa-viklavatvena**
tūṣṇīm **avasthitaḥ** sann **amuṁ hariṁ hṛdopaguhya adhād** dhṛtavān
\|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : sa** pṛthuḥ vākya-bhedāt sa
ity asya paunaruktyaṁ na \|\|21\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** bhagavataḥ kṛpātirekam
uktvā tasya pṛthor bhakty-atiśayam āha---sa iti \|\|21\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.22 \|\|**

**athāvamṛjyāśru-kalā vilokayann**

**atṛpta-dṛg-gocaram āha pūruṣam \|**

**padā spṛśantaṁ kṣitim aṁsa unnate**

**vinyasta-hastāgram uraṅga-vidviṣaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : atṛptayor dṛśor gocaraṁ**
viṣaya-bhūtam \| **padā** **kṣitiṁ** **spṛśantam** iti \| ayaṁ
bhāvaḥ---na khalu devāḥ padā bhuvaṁ spṛśanti, ataḥ kṛpā-para-vaśo nūnaṁ
harir ātmānaṁ vismṛtavān iveti \| ata eva skhalana-parihārāyaiva
garuḍasya \[**uraṅga-vidviṣaḥ**\] **unnate** -skandhe \[**aṁse**\]
**vinyastaṁ hastāgraṁ** yena tam \|\|22\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** ato\'tra \| ata eva
vismṛtātmatvād eva \| atha hṛdi dhāraṇottaram \|\|22\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : atṛptayor dṛśor gocaraṁ**
viṣaya-bhūtam \| **padā kṣitiṁ spṛśantam** ity atra bhāvaḥ
śrī-svāmi-caraṇair vyākhyātaḥ---na khalu devāḥ padā bhuvaṁ spṛśanti,
ataḥ kṛpā-para-vaśo nūnaṁ harir ātmānaṁ vismṛtavān iva iti \| ata eva
skhalana-parihārāyaiva garuḍasyonnate -skandhe **vinyastaṁ hastāgraṁ**
yena tam iti \|\|22\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.23 \|\|**

**pṛthur uvāca---**

**varān vibho tvad varadeśvarād budhaḥ**

**kathaṁ vṛṇīte guṇa-vikriyātmanām \|**

**ye nārakāṇām api santi dehināṁ**

**tān īśa kaivalya-pate vṛṇe na ca \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** varaṁ vṛṇīṣva \[bha.pu.
4.20.16\] iti yad uktaṁ tad asahamāna āha---he **vibho** ! **varadānāṁ**
brahmādīnām **īśvarād** vara-pradāt **tvat** tvattaḥ sakāśād **budhaḥ
kathaṁ varān vṛṇīte** ? kīdṛśān ? **guṇair vikriyata** iti
guṇa-vikriyo'haṅkāraḥ, sa eva **ātmā** yeṣāṁ, teṣāṁ brahmādīnāṁ
sambandhinaḥ \| **dehābhimānināṁ** bhogyān iti vā \| tathā ced **budha**
eva na bhavatīty arthaḥ \| jugupsitatvād apīty āha---**ye** iti \| budha
evāham api **na vṛṇe** iti samuccayāya **ca**-kāraḥ \|\|23\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) : vibho** iti \| na hi
**vibho** varaṁ vṛṇīṣva \[bhā.pu. 4.20.16\] iti kathanaṁ yuktaṁ
vibhutva-hāni-prasaṅgād iti bhāvaḥ \| ātmātmatvenābhimataḥ \|
**kaivalya-pate** iti kaivalya-kāmo\'pi **yān na vṛṇīte**, tān ahaṁ
kaivalyasyāpy asahiṣṇuḥ **kathaṁ vṛṇe** ? iti bhāvaḥ \| **īśa** iti
svābhimata-dāne sāmarthyaṁ dyotayati \|\|23\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā : varān** iti \| dvitīye'smin dāna-vīra-prabhede
pṛthur bhakta ity abhipretyāha---**pṛthur** iti \| varaṁ ca mat kañcana
mānavendra vṛṇīṣva te'haṁ guṇa-śīla-yantritaḥ \[bhā.pu. 4.20.16\] iti
bhagavad-uktiṁ niśamyāha---**varān** iti \| **guṇa-vikriyātmanāṁ**
guṇa-vikāra-rūpāṇāṁ brahmādīnāṁ **varān varadeśvaratayā tvattaḥ kathaṁ
vṛṇīte** ? brahma-padādīnāṁ viṣaya-sukhātmakatvāt \| viṣaya-sukhāni ca
**nārakāṇāṁ** naraka-nivāsinām **api santi** \| atas **tān**
brahma-padādi-rūpān varān **naiva vṛṇe**'haṁ, yatas tvam **īśaḥ**
samarthaḥ \| **kaivalya-patiś** ca kaivalyaṁ ca tavādhīnam \|\|23\|\|
\[mu.pha. 19.3\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** atha siddhopadeśa-svīkāre
prakāra-viśeṣo darśayiṣyate \| vare tu darśyate---**varān vibho** iti \|
**varadānāṁ** brahmādīnām api **īśvarāt** sarvātiśaya-vara-dāyakād api
**tvatta** ity arthaḥ, yo **budhaḥ** **kathaṁ vṛṇīte** ? **ca**-kārād
aham abudho'pi **na vṛṇe** ity arthaḥ \|\|23\|\| \[prīti-sandarbhe
27-saṅkhyakānucchedaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ.\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** varaṁ vṛṇīṣva \[bha.pu.
4.20.16\] etasyottaram āha---**varān budhaḥ kathaṁ vṛṇīte,** kintv
abudha evety arthaḥ \| tatrāpi **guṇair vikriyā** vikāro yasya
tathā-bhūta **ātmā** mano yeṣāṁ karmiṇāṁ sambandhinaḥ svargādīn ity
arthaḥ \| **kaivalya-pate** iti kaivalya-kāmo'pi yān na vṛṇīte, tān ahaṁ
kaivalya-nāmāpy asahiṣṇuḥ kathaṁ **vṛṇe** ? iti bhāvaḥ \|\|23\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.24 \|\|**

**na kāmaye nātha tad apy ahaṁ kvacin**

**na yatra yuṣmac-caraṇāmbujāsavaḥ \|**

**mahattamāntar-hṛdayān mukha-cyuto**

**vidhatsva karṇāyutam eṣa me varaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kaivalya-pata \[23\] iti
sambodhanāt kaivalyaṁ variṣyatīti māśaṅkīr ity āha---neti \|
**mahattamānām** **antar-hṛdayān** **mukha**-dvāreṇa \[**cyuto**\]
nirgato bhavat-padāmbhoja-makarando \[**yuṣmac-caraṇāmbujāsavaḥ**\]
yaśaḥ-śravaṇādi-sukhaṁ **yatra** **na** asti, tādṛśaṁ cet kaivalyaṁ,
tarhi **tat** **kvacit** kadācid **api na kāmaye** \| tarhi kiṁ kāmayase
? tad āha---yaśaḥ-śravaṇāya **karṇānām ayutaṁ vidhatsva** \| nanu ko'py
evaṁ na vṛtavān \| kim anya-cintayā ? ity āha---**mama** tu **eṣa** eva
**varaḥ** \|\|24\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** kaivalyam api yebhya eva
rocate, tebhya eva tad dīyatām ity abhiprāyeṇaiva mayā
tac-chabdenāmantrito\'sīty āha---**na** iti \| varaś ca mat kañcaneti
yad uktaṁ tatra sāmānyato varān **ahaṁ** **na** eva **kāmaye**
viśeṣato\'pi kañcana varaṁ kaivalyaṁ tad api na, kutaḥ ? yatra kaivalye
**antar** **hṛdayena** āsvādyānandodrekāt kīrtyamāna ity arthaḥ \|
śuka-mukhād amṛta-drava-saṁyutam \[bhā.pu. 1.1.3\] itivan
mahad-āsvādyatve sati tasyāpi mādhuryam udayata iti bhāvaḥ \| madhuram
api jalaṁ kṣāra-bhūmi-pratiṣṭhaṁ yathā virasī-bhavati, tathaiva
avaiṣṇava-mukha-nirgato bhagavad-guṇo\'pi na rocako bhavatīti vyatirekaś
ca gamyaḥ \| **mahatāṁ** guṇa-kathānāc cānantyāt yatra yatra yair yair
yā yā guṇa-kathāḥ kīrtyamānāḥ, tāsām ekām api guṇa-kathāṁ tyaktuṁ na
śaknomīty atilobhāt **karṇāyuta**-spṛhā, tena kaivalya-kāmā yebhya
indriyebhyo druhyanti, tān evāhaṁ kāmaya iti dyotitam \|\|24\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** tarhi kaivalyam eva vṛṇīṣva iti cet tatrāha---**na
kāmaya** iti \| **tad api na kāmaye yatra** kaivalye
**yuṣmac-caraṇāmbujasyāsavo** makarandaḥ \| **kvacid** eka-deśe'pi nāsti
bhakti-sukhaṁ nāstīty arthaḥ \| sa hi mahattamānām antar-hṛdaya atati
satataṁ gacchatīti **mahattamāntar-hṛdayāt** \| ata kvī-rūpam \|
tad-dhṛdayāntar-vartī tan**-mukha-cyutam** āsvādyante'nyaiḥ, ato
bahubhyo yugapat tad-ākarṇanārthaṁ **karṇānantyam** eva **me** mahyaṁ
**vidhatsva** \| **eṣa** eva **varaḥ** \|\|24\|\| \[mu.pha. 19.4\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : na kāmaye** iti \| **tad api**
kaivalyam api \| **karṇāyuta**-prārthanam atyāsakti-paratvam \|\|24\|\|
\[prīti-sandarbha 27\*\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** kiṁ vā, kaivalya-pate
\[23\] iti sambodhanāt kaivalyaṁ variṣyatīti mā śaṅkiṣṭhāḥ, kintu
kaivalyam api yebhya eva rocate, tebhya eva tad dīyatām ity
ābhiprāyeṇaiva tu mayā tac-chabdenāmantrito'sīty āha---**na** iti \|
varaṁ ca mat kañcana vṛṇuṣva \[bhā.pu. 4.20.16\] iti yad uktam, tatra
sāmānyato varān ahaṁ naiva kāmaye \| viśeṣato'pi kañcana varaṁ
kaivalyam, tad api **kvacit** kadācid atiduḥkha-daśāyām api **na
kāmaye**\|

kutaḥ ? yatra kaivalye **yuṣmac-caraṇāmbujasya āsavo** makarandas
tadīya-guṇa-kathā-mādhurya-bharo nāsti \| kīdṛśaḥ ? **mahattamānām antar
hṛdayāt** **mukha**-dvārā **cyutaḥ** antar-hṛdayenāsvādyānandodrekāt
kīrtyamāna ity arthaḥ \| śuka-mukhād amṛta-drava-saṁyutam \[bhā.pu.
1.1.3\] itivan mahad-āsvādyatve sati tasyātimādhuryam udayate iti bhāvaḥ
\| madhuram api jalaṁ kṣāra-bhūmi-praviṣṭaṁ yathā virasībhavati,
tathaivāvaiṣṇava-mukha-nirgato bhagavad-guṇo'pi nātirocaka iti
vyatirekaś ca gamyaḥ \|

tarhi kiṁ kāmayasi ? ity atrāha---**vidhatsva** iti \| mahatāṁ
guṇa-kathāṁ cānāntyāt yatra yatra yair yair yā yā guṇa-kathāḥ
kīrtyamānāḥ syuḥ, tāsām ekām api kathām ahaṁ tyaktuṁ na śaknomīty
atilobhāt **karṇānantya**-spṛhā, tena kaivalya-kāmā yebhyaḥ
śrotrādīndriyebhyo priyebhyo druhyanti, tāny evāhaṁ kāmaye iti dyotitam
\| nanu ko'py evaṁ na vṛṇīte ? satyam \| **mama** tv **eṣa eva varo**,
nānya iti \|\|24\|\|

\[atrānurūpārthakaṁ 10.51.55-tama-padye śrī-mucukunda-stavo draṣṭavyaḥ
\|\|\]

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.25 \|\|**

**sa uttamaśloka mahan-mukha-cyuto**

**bhavat-padāmbhoja-sudhā-kaṇānilaḥ \|**

**smṛtiṁ punar vismṛta-tattva-vartmanāṁ**

**kuyogināṁ no vitaraty alaṁ varaiḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** nanu tarhi kaivalyābhāve
rāga-dveṣādy-ākulānāṁ bhakti-sukham api na syād ity āśaṅkyāha---sa iti
\| **bhavat-padāmbhoja-sudhāyāḥ kaṇo** leśas tat-sambandhī yo'**nilaḥ**
sa eva \| dūrād api kiñcid yaśaḥ-śravaṇa-mātram ity arthaḥ \|
**vismṛtaṁ** **tattva-vartma** yaiḥ **kuyogibhis** teṣām api punaḥ
**smṛtim** ātma-jñānaṁ **vitarati** \| ato na khalu bhaktānāṁ
rāgādi-saṁbhavaḥ, ato **no**'smākaṁ sāra-grāhiṇām anyair **varair alam**
\| bhaktāv eva mokṣādi-sarva-sukhāntar-bhāvād iti bhāvaḥ \|\|25\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** atrākṣipati---*nanv* iti
\| *ity artha* iti \| tat-sambandhī tāvad anilo\'pi kutaḥ ? kaṇaḥ
kutastarāṁ ? sā sudhā tad-guṇa-kathā-leśa-prasaṅgān iti bhāvaḥ, ataḥ
prāpta-jñānatvāt \| ato rāgādy-abhāvāt \| *ity artha* iti---

> yā nirvṛtis tanubhṛtāṁ tava pādapadma-
>
> dhyānād bhavaj-jana-kathā-śravaṇena vā syāt \|
>
> sā brahmaṇi sva-mahimany api nātha mā bhūt \|\| \[bhā.pu. 4.9.10\]
> ity-ukter iti bhāvaḥ \|\|25\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** mukti-sukhe bhakti-sukhābhāvāt bhakti-sukhe
mukti-sukhābhāvo nāstīty āha---**sa uttameti** \| **sudhā-kaṇānāṁ**
amṛta-bindūnām **anilo** dūrād api śravaṇam ity arthaḥ \| **vismṛtaṁ
tattva-vartma** yaiḥ, teṣāṁ **kuyoginām** asmākaṁ tat-**smṛtiṁ
vitarati** svarūpānubhava-sukha-rūpāṁ muktiṁ dadātīty arthaḥ \|
viṣaya-saṅge'pi mokṣa-kāmatvāt kuyogitvam \| mukti-sukhena saha
bhakti-sukhaṁ sva-bhaktānām astīty arthaḥ \|\|25\|\| \[mu.pha. 19.5\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** yadi ca vayaṁ na
tādṛśa-prārthanādhikāriṇaḥ gāḍhāsakty-abhāvāt, tathāpi tac-chravaṇam eva
stād ity āha---sa iti \| **tattvam** atra tat-**padāmbhojam** eva mūlaṁ
tad-anugatatvena śuddhātma-jñānaṁ ca \|\|25\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu mahā-tattva-jñair
api durlabhaṁ kaivalyam api kuto necchasi ? iti tatra vyāja-stutim
āśrity āha---sa iti \| **bhavat-padāmbhoja-sudhāyāḥ kaṇo** leśas
tat-sambandhī tāvad **anilo**'pi kim uta tat-kaṇaḥ \| kim utatarāṁ sā
sudhā \| tad-guṇa-kathā-leśa-prasaṅgo'pīty arthaḥ \| **smṛtiṁ**
tvac-caraṇa-smaraṇaṁ **vitarati** \| ata eva vismṛta-tattva-mārgāṇām iti
tvayopadiṣṭaṁ yan navadhā vailakṣaṇya-sālakṣaṇyābhyām
paramātma-jīvātma-deha-tattvaṁ, tad adhunaiva mayā **vismṛtam**, ata eva
**kuyoginām** iti vyāja-stutiḥ \|

asmākaṁ \[**no**\] **varair alam** \| vismṛta-tattva-vartmatvāt
kaivalyena tvat-kathāsvādaika-vratatvād varāntarair apy asmākaṁ
prayojanaṁ nāsti \| vayaṁ kuyogino nikṛṣṭāḥ khalv
abhyasta-tattva-vartmānaḥ suyogino bhavituṁ na prabhavāmeti kathaṁ
kaivalyāya spṛhayāmaḥ ? iti \| kathaṁ vā kīṭa-viśeṣā madhuvratā iva
tvac-caraṇa-kamala-makarandāsvāda-mātreṇaiva pūrṇā rājyādi-sampattīḥ
prāptuṁ śaknumaḥ ? iti bhaṅgyā sveṣām evotkarṣo dhvanitaḥ \|\|25\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.26 \|\|**

**yaśaḥ śivaṁ suśrava ārya-saṅgame**

**yadṛcchayā copaśṛṇoti te sakṛt \|**

**kathaṁ guṇa-jño viramed vinā paśuṁ**

**śrīr yat pravavre guṇa-saṅgrahecchayā \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** nanu bhaktir mukti-phalaiva,
ataḥ phalaṁ vihāya sādhane bhavataḥ ko'yam āgrahaḥ ? ity āśaṅkyāha---he
**suśravaḥ** ! maṅgala-kīrte ! te **śivaṁ** **yaśaḥ** satāṁ **saṅgame**
yaḥ **sakṛd** api **yadṛcchayā** apy **upaśṛṇoti** **guṇa-jñaś** cet, sa
**paśuṁ vinā**'nyaḥ **kathaṁ viramet** ? guṇātiśayaṁ sūcayati---**śrīr
yad** yaśa eva **pra**karṣeṇa **vṛtavatī** \| guṇānāṁ
sarva-puruṣārthānāṁ **saṅgrahaḥ** svasmin samāhāras tad-**icchayā**
\|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** punar ākṣipati---*nanv*
iti \| yato muktir eva bhakti-phalam *ato* hetoḥ \| atra
viśvanāthaḥ---nanu mat-kathāsvādād api viramya yogīndra-spṛhaṇīyaṁ
kaivalyam eva gṛhāṇeti tatrāha---**yaśa** iti \| he **suśravaḥ** !
maṅgala-kīrte ! yaśaḥ-śravaṇenaiva---

> kaivalya-saṁmata-pathas tv atha bhakti-yogaḥ \|
>
> ko nirvṛto hari-kathāsu ratiṁ na kuryāt \|\| \[bhā.pu. 2.3.12\]

iti nyāyena na mokṣārthaṁ yatnāntaraṁ kāryam iti bhāvaḥ \| tava yaśaḥ
**yadṛcchayā** ayatnato\'kasmāt prāptam api **sakṛd** api yaḥ **śṛṇoti**
**guṇajñaś** cet sa kathaṁ tasmād **viramet** **paśuṁ vinā** iti yo
viramet sa manuṣyeṣu paśur, yo na viramet sa paśuṣv api manuṣya iti
dhvaniḥ\| tac cāpi citta-baḍiśaṁ śanakair viyuṅkte \[bhā.pu. 3.28.34\]
ity-ādy-ukta-lakṣaṇa-lakṣitād yuṣmad-yaśaḥ-pīyūṣād viramate yogine
traivargikās te puruṣā vimukhā hari-medhasaḥ \| kathāyām \[bhā.pu.
3.32.18\] ity-ādy-ukta-svabhāvāya sa-karmaṇe ca paśave piṇyāka-tuṣādikam
iva kaivalyaṁ dehi, na tu mahyaṁ manuṣyāyety anudhvaniḥ \|

nanu mad-yaśaḥ-svādād api kaivalyādikam adhikaṁ bhaved ity atra yogī
sa-karmā ca pramāṇaṁ kaivalyādibhyo mad-yaśaḥ-svādo\'dhika iti
bhavan-mate kaḥ pramāṇam ? iti tatrāha---**śrīr** mahā-lakṣmīr
brahmādi-sarva-jagat-pūjyā sarva-guṇa-paṇḍitāpi tad-yaśo **vavre**
**guṇānāṁ** tadīya-rūpa-rasa-gandha-śabda-sparśa-līlā-lāvaṇya-kāruṇyānāṁ
**samyag-grahaṇam** āsvādana-sāmarthyaṁ tad-**icchayā** iti saivātra
pramāṇaṁ tad-upalakṣitā anye\'py āsvādita-cara-kaivalya-sukham api
laghūkariṣṇavo yaśasy eva ramamāṇāḥ śukādayo\'pi pramāṇaṁ
ghāsa-buddhyaivekṣu-pallavāni carann apy antas tadīya-kāṇḍeṣv arucir
ghāsam evāsvādayan vṛṣa iva yogī sahakāra-pallavāni tyaktvā kaṇṭakam
evāsvādayann uṣṭra iva sakarmā kiṁ pramāṇaṁ bhavet ? iti bhāvaḥ
\|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** śravaṇasya duḥsampādakatvāt susampādakatve'pi
pariṇati-virasatvāt bhakti-sukhaṁ durlabham iti cet, tatrāha---**yaśa**
iti \| he **suśravaḥ** ! sukīrte ! **yadṛcchayā** guru-śiṣya-bhāvaṁ
vināpi **upaśṛṇoti** \| upaśrotṛtayā **asakṛd** vāraṁ vāram \|
**ca**-śabdaś ced-arthe **paśuṁ vinā** anyaḥ **kathaṁ viramet** ? yato
**guṇajñaḥ** \| mukti-sukhe'pi guṇāḥ santīti cet, tatrāha---**śrīr** iti
\| śrīḥ bhūtiḥ sukha-svāminī yad bhakti-sukhaṁ **pra**karṣeṇa **vavre**
\| bhakti-**guṇān saṅgṛhya** mukti-guṇeṣv ādhātum **icchayā** \| atra
**yaśasaḥ śivatvāt** nirvighnatvam \| **suśrava** iti nirdeśasya
sambodhana-paratve'pi viśeṣaṇa-pradhānatvāt śobhanatvena
sukha-grāhyatvam \| ārya-saṅgama-hetutvāt sulabhatvam uktam \|\|26\|\|
\[mu.pha. 19.6\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**yaśaḥ śivaṁ suśrava ārya-saṅgame**

**yadṛcchayā copaśṛṇoti te sakṛt \|**

**kathaṁ guṇa-jño viramed vinā paśuṁ**

**śrīr yat pravavre guṇa-saṅgrahecchayā \|\|**

**sanātana-gosvāmī:** \[ha.bha.vi. 10.469\] nanu bhaktir
mukti-phalaiva, ataḥ phalaṁ vihāya sādhane ko'yam āgrahaḥ ? ity
āśaṅkyāha---**yaśa** iti \| he **suśravaḥ** ! maṅgala-kīrte ! **śivaṁ**
parama-sukhātmakaṁ te **yaśaḥ** **satāṁ saṅgame** yaḥ **sakṛd** api
**yadṛcchayā** apy **upa** śrotṝṇāṁ samīpe upaviṣṭa-mātro'pi **śṛṇoti**
**guṇajñaś** cet kathā-māhātmyābhijñaś cet, sa **kathaṁ viramet** ?
**paśuṁ vinā**, paśur eva viramati, nānya ity arthaḥ \| guṇātiśayaṁ
sūcayati---**śrīr yad** yaśa eva **prakarṣeṇa vṛtavatī** \| **guṇānāṁ**
sarva-puruṣārthānāṁ **saṅgrahaḥ** samāhāraḥ, tad-**icchayā**, ato
yaśaḥ-sevayaiva paramānando'vāntara-phalatvenākhilārtha-siddhir apīti \|
kiṁ mūla-parityāgena patra-mātra-cchāyāśrayaṇena ? iti dik \|

athavā, mat-kathā-śravaṇa-mātreṇa kṛtārtha evāsi \| kiṁ punas
tac-chravaṇāgraheṇa ? tatrāha---**yaśa** iti \| anyathā
guṇajñatvābhāvena paśutvāpatter iti bhāvaḥ \| anyat samānam \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** yato **yaśa** iti \| **paśuṁ
vinā** yo'nyo **guṇajño** manuṣya-mātraḥ sa **kathaṁ viramet** ? sa
manuṣyeṣv api paśuḥ \| yo na viramet sa paśuṣv api parama-guṇajña ity
arthaḥ \| **guṇānāṁ** tvadīyānāṁ **saṅgrahecchayā** ātmani
pratisaṅkramitum icchayā \|\|26\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu mat-kathāsvādād api
viramya yogīndra-spṛhaṇīyaṁ kaivalyam eva gṛhāṇeti tatrāha---**yaśa**
iti \| he **suśravaḥ** ! maṅgala-kīrte ! **tava yaśaḥ yadṛcchayā**
ayatnato'kasmāt prāptam api sakṛd api yaḥ **śṛṇoti guṇajñaś** cet sa
**kathaṁ** tasmāt **viramet** ? **paśuṁ vinā** iti \| yo viramet, sa
manuṣyeṣu paśuḥ, yo na viramet, sa paśuṣv api manuṣya iti dhvaniḥ \|

tac cāpi citta-vaḍiśaṁ śanakair viyuṅkte \[bhā.pu. 3.28.34\]
ity-ādy-ukta-lakṣaṇa-lakṣitāt yuṣmad-yaśaḥ-pīyūṣād viramate yogine,
traivargikās te puruṣā vimukhā hari-medhasaḥ \| kathāyāṁ
\[bhā.pu.3.32.18\] ity-ādy-ukta-svabhāvāya karmiṇe ca paśave
piṇyāka-tuṣa-buṣādikam iva kaivalyādikaṁ dehi, na tu mahyaṁ manuṣyāyety
anudhvaniḥ \|

nanu mad-yaśaḥ-svādād api kaivalyādikam adhikaṁ bhaved ity atra yogī
karmī ca pramāṇam \| ititatrāha---**śrīr** mahā-lakṣmīr
brahmādi-sarva-jagat-pūjyā sarva-guṇa-maṇḍitāpi tvad-yaśo **vavre**
**guṇānāṁ**
tvadīya-rūpa-rasa-gandha-śabda-sparśa-līlā-lāvaṇya-kāruṇyāṇāṁ
**samyak-grahaṇam** āsvādana-sāmarthyaṁ tad-**icchayeti** saivātra
pramāṇaṁ, tad-upalakṣitā anye'py āsvādita-cara-kaivalya-sukham api
laghūkariṣṇavo yaśasy eva ramamāṇāḥ śukādayo'pi pramāṇam \|
ghāsa-buddhyaivekṣu-pallavāni carann apy antatas tadīya-kāṇḍeṣv arucir
ghāsam evāsvādayan vṛṣa iva yogī, sahakāra-pallavāni tyaktvā kaṇṭakam
eva svādayan uṣṭra iva karmī kiṁ pramāṇaṁ bhavet ? iti bhāvaḥ \| bhaktāv
eva mokṣādi-sarva-sukhāntarbhāvāt, guṇānāṁ sarva-puruṣārthānāṁ saṅgrahaḥ
svasmin samāhāras tad-icchayā iti svāmi-caraṇāḥ \|\|26\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.27 \|\|**

**athābhaje tvākhila-pūruṣottamaṁ**

**guṇālayaṁ padma-kareva lālasaḥ \|**

**apy āvayor eka-pati-sp****ṛdhoḥ kalir**

**na syāt kṛta-tvac-caraṇaika-tānayoḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ato lakṣmīr ivānya-vara-tyāgena
**tvām** evāhaṁ **bhaja** ity āha---**atha** iti \| **lālasa** utsukaḥ
san \| karmaṇi kriyamāṇe yathendreṇa saha **kalir** evaṁ bhaktāv api kiṁ
lakṣmyā saha kaliḥ syāt ? iti vitarkayati \| **ekasmin patyau
spardhamānayor āvayor** **api** kiṁ **kalir na syād** ? iti kākvā
vitarkaḥ \| nanu paryāyeṇa sevāyāṁ na syāt ? naivam \| **kṛtas
tvac-caraṇayor evaikas tāno** mano-vistāro yābhyāṁ tayoḥ \|\|27\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** yato lakṣmīs tvāṁ
bhajate\'*to* hetoḥ \| atra viśvanāthaḥ---ataḥ kevalaṁ bhajanam eva
vṛṇe, na tu varān ity āha \| **atha** ataḥ **ā** samyak niṣkāma eva
kevalām eva bhaktiṁ kurve, na tu jñāna-karmādi-siddhy-arthaṁ
jñāni-sakarma-guṇībhūtām ity arthaḥ \| tatrāpi na nāradādir iva kintu
padma-karā lakṣmīr iva
mārjana-lepana-pāda-saṁvāhana-vyajana-tāṁbūlārpaṇādibhir abhīkṣṇam evety
arthaḥ \| yato **lālasaḥ** lālasāvān sa mahāl lālasā dvayoḥ ity
abhidhānād atyadhikaṁ spṛha ity arthaḥ \| na cātra pṛthor ujjvala-bhāva
āśaṅkanīyaḥ, uttara-śloke jagaj-jananyām ity ukteḥ \| jagati ca
svasyāntaḥ-pātāl lakṣmyāṁ jananī-bhāvena svasya dāsya-bhāva-vyaktaḥ \|
ataḥ **padma-kareva** ity upameyam \| paricaraṇāṁśenaiva
bhagavac-caraṇa-paricaryāyāṁ tasyā evātiprasiddheḥ lakṣmyāṁ
parama-bhaktimato\'pi svasya vīra-bhaktatvaṁ vācaiva dyotayann
āha---apīti \| aparaṁ svāmi-caraṇoktivat \| samādhaye śaṅkate---*nanv*
iti \| pariharati---*naivam* iti \|\|27\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** śatakratutve śakrasya spardhāvat viṣṇu-bhaktatve
lakṣmī-spardhā-doṣo'stīty āha---**atha** iti \| **atha**-śabdaḥ praśne
\| atha **kalir na syāt** \| **abhajam** iti \| bhajanārambha-bhūtatvāl
laṭ-prayogaḥ\| **lālasa** utkaṇṭhāvān \| **padma-karā** iti
viśeṣaṇa-pradhāno nirdeśaḥ bhagavad-upāyanārthaṁ līlā-kamala-dhāriṇīty
arthaḥ \| sā yathā bhajati \| tvaṁ hi prakṛtyā sarva-puruṣeṣu uttamaḥ
**guṇāḍhyaś** ca guṇā saundaryādayaḥ \| **api** aho \| ahaṁ ca sā ca,
āvām iti virūpatve'pi tvad-āder mitho dvandve yad yat paraṁ, tat svasya
iti vārtikād asmac-chabdaḥ śiṣyate \| yata āvām ekasmin vastuni
sa-spṛhau **eka-pati-spṛhatve**'pi spṛhāyāḥ bhinna-pradeśa-viṣayatvena
na virodha iti cet, tad api nāstīty āha---**kṛta**- iti \|
**eka-tānatvam** ananya-vṛttitvāt \| evaṁ kali-viṣaye saṁśayya svayam
eva niścinoti \|\|27\|\| \[mu.pha. 19.7\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : athābhaja** ity-ādi-dvayaṁ na khalv
asya tat-kānta-bhāvād vāsanā jātā, kintu bhakti-vāsanaiva \| dṛṣṭāntas
tv atra tasyā bhakty-aṁśa eva \| tayā **spardhā** tu
tat-parama-kṛponnaddhatvena vīrākhya-dāsyatāṁ prāptasya nāyogyeti \|
anye tv evaṁ manyante tat khalu
tadīya-dīna-viṣayaka-kṛpā-sūcaka-sa-prema-vacana-vinoda-mātraṁ, na tu
lakṣmī-spardhāvahaṁ, **karoṣi** ity anena svasmiṁs tucchatva-mananāt \|

athavā **athābhaja** iti kalahābhāva eva yojyam \| tatra
hetuḥ---**tvac-caraṇa-** iti \| **jagaj-jananyām** \[28\] iti tu kalahe
\|\|27\|\|

**\[prīti-sandarbha 175\]** atra dāsa-bhāvākhya-bhakti-mayasya
prakṛtatvena yogyasya tad-ayogyojjvala-saṅgatyābhāsitatvam \| tatra
dāsa-bhāvas tat-prakaraṇa-siddha eva \| ujjvala-saṅgatiś ca
**padma-karā** **iva lālasa** ity-ādināvagamyate \|

atra samādhānaṁ ca \| na khalv asya tadvat kānta-bhāva-vāsanā jātā,
kintu bhakti-vāsanaiva \| dṛṣṭāntas tatra tasyā bhakty-aṁśa eva\| tayā
**spardhā** tu tat-parama-kṛponnaddhatvena vīrākhya-dāsatāṁ prāptasya
nāyogyeti \| anye tv evaṁ manyante \| tat khalu
tadīya-dīna-viṣayaka-kṛpā-sūcaka-sva-prema-vacana-vinoda-mātraṁ, na tu
lakṣmī-spardhāvaham \| **karoṣi phalgv apy uru dīna-vatsalaḥ** iti
svasmiṁs tucchatva-mananāt \|

evaṁ śrī-trivikrameṇa bali-śirasi caraṇe'rpite nemaṁ viriñco labhate
prasādam \[bhā.pu. 8.23.6\] iti śrī-prahlāda-vākyam api dṛṣṭam \|
śrī-nṛsiṁha-kṛpāyāṁ svānukampāyām api---

> kvāhaṁ rajaḥ-prabhava īśa tamo'dhike'smin
>
> jātaḥ suretara-kule kva tavānukampā \|
>
> na brahmaṇo na tu bhavasya na vai ramāyā
>
> yan me'rpitaḥ śirasi padma-karaḥ prasādaḥ \|\| \[bhā.pu. 7.9.26\]

atra brahmāder adhunā vidyamānasyāpi *mamaiva* *śirasi* ity arthaḥ \|
ata ubhayatrāpi tat-tad-avatāra-samayāpekṣayaiva tādṛśa-prasādābhāvo
vivakṣita iti jñeyam \|\|27-28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**athābhaje tvākhila-pūruṣottamaṁ**

**guṇālayaṁ padma-kareva lālasaḥ \|**

**apy āvayor eka-pati-spṛdhoḥ kalir**

**na syāt kṛta-tvac-caraṇaika-tānayoḥ \|\|**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** ataḥ kevalaṁ bhajanam eva
vṛṇe, na tu varam ity āha---**atha** **ā** samyak niṣkāma eva kaivalyam
eva bhaktiṁ kurve, na tu jñāna-karmādi-siddhaṁ jñānī karmīva guṇī-bhūtām
ity arthaḥ \| tatrāpi na nāradādir iva, kintu padma-karā lakṣmīr iva
mārjana-lepana-pāda-saṁvāhana-vyajana-tāmbūlārpaṇādibhir abhīkṣṇam evety
arthaḥ \| yato **lālasaḥ** lālasāvān, sa mahān lālasā dvayoḥ ity
abhidhānād atyadhikaṁ spṛhe ity arthaḥ \|

na cātra pṛthor ujjvala-bhāva āśaṅkanīyaḥ \| uttara-śloke
**jagaj-jananyām** ity-ukteḥ \| jagati ca svasyāntaḥ-pātāl lakṣmyāṁ
jananī-bhāvena svasya dāsya-bhāva-vyakteḥ \| tataḥ **padma-karā iva**
ity upameyaṁ paricaraṇāṁśenaiva bhagavac-caraṇa-paricaryāyāṁ tasyā
evātiprasiddheḥ \| lakṣmyāṁ parama-bhaktimato'pi svasya vīra-bhaktatvaṁ
vā caiva dyotayann āha---**api** iti \| karmaṇi kriyamāṇe yathendreṇa
saha kaliḥ, evaṁ bhaktāv api lakṣmyā saha kaliḥ syād iti vitarkayati \|
**ekasmin patyau spardhamānayor** api kiṁ **kalir na syāt** ? iti kākvā
vitarkaḥ \|

nanu paryāyeṇa sevāyāṁ na syāt ? maivam \| kṛtas **tac-caraṇayor
ekatāno**'virāmo mano-vistāro yābhyām tayoḥ \|\|27\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.28 \|\|**

**jagaj-jananyāṁ jagad-īśa vaiśasaṁ**

**syād eva yat-karmaṇi naḥ samīhitam \|**

**karoṣi phalgv apy uru dīna-vatsalaḥ**

**sva eva dhiṣṇye'bhiratasya kiṁ tayā \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : dhiṣṇyaṁ** tejaś ca sāmarthyaṁ
mahimā dhāma cocyate ity abhidhānam \| alpa-puṇyatvān na
mad-bhakti-yogya iti mantavyam \| yataḥ **phalgv** **apy uru karoṣi
vātsalyāt** \| vinā vātsalyaṁ śriyāpi **kiṁ tayā** ? \|\|28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** bhavatu vā kaliḥ, tathāpi
bhajeyam evety āha---**jagaj-jananyāṁ** **vaiśasaṁ** virodhaḥ **syād
eva** \| tatra hetuḥ---**yasyāḥ karmaṇi** **naḥ samīhitam** icchā
bhavati \| tathāpīndra-virodhe mat-pakṣa-pātavad atrāpi tava pakṣa-pāta
eva syād ity āha---**phalgu** tuccham apy **uru** bahu **karoṣi** \|
yato **dīneṣu vatsalo** dayāvān \| **sve** svarūpa eva **ratasya tayā
kiṁ** prayojanam ? tāṁ nādriyase ity arthaḥ \|\|28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** tatra virodhe \| tathāpi
lakṣmyā virodhe\'pi \| ity artha iti \| tayopādeyābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ \|
cakravartī tu---

> kṛpāṁ tasya samāśritya prauḍhaṁ nānyamapekṣate \|
>
> atulāṁ yo vahetkṛṣṇe prītiṁ vīraḥ sa ucyate \|\| \[bha.ra.si. 3.2.53\]

iti vīra-bhaktocitaṁ sva-svabhāvaṁ prakaṭayann āha---**jagaj-jananyāṁ**
jagan-madhya-vartitvena mamāpi jananyāṁ lakṣmyāṁ **vaiśasaṁ** virodhaḥ
**syād eva** \| kutaḥ ? **yasyāḥ karmaṇi** tvat-pāda-sevā-rūpe
**no**\'smākam icchā jātā sā khalu yuṣmad-vakṣasy āsīnā virājatu, ahaṁ
putra eva sarvaṁ yuṣmac-caraṇa-paricaraṇaṁ karavāṇi, tasyāḥ ko\'yam
āgraho yat paricaraṇaṁ vinā na jīvatīti bhāvaḥ \|

nanu tvam arvācīnaḥ sātiprācīnā \| tvaṁ nikṛṣṭaḥ sātimahatīti tayā saha
kiṁ virudhyase ? satyam \| tathāpīndra-virodhe mat-pakṣapātavad atrāpi
mayi tava pakṣapātaḥ syād ity āha---**phalgu** tuccham **api** tvam
**uru karoṣi** yato **dīneṣu vatsalaḥ** \|

nanu tvaṁ tasyāḥ kopān na bibheṣi kiṁ ? tatra satyaṁ na bibhemīty
āha---**sva eva dhiṣṇye** sva-sāmarthye\'bhiratasya mama **tayā kiṁ**
kim apīty arthaḥ \| tat-kṛpodreka eva sāmarthyaṁ \| yad uktaṁ
vīra-bhaktodāharaṇeṣu---

> pralamba-ripur īśvaro bhavatu kā kṛtis tena me
>
> kumāra makara-dhvajād api na kiṁcid āste phalam \|
>
> kim anyad aham uddhataḥ prabhu-kṛpā-kaṭākṣa-śriyā
>
> priyā-pariṣad-agrimāṁ na gaṇayāmi tāṁ mām api \|\| \[bha.ra.si.
> 3.2.54\] iti \|

dhiṣṇyaṁ śaktau ca pārade iti puṁskāṇḍe\'mara-dattaḥ \|

**jagadīśa** iti \| pitus tava puruṣa-viśeṣasya rakṣakatve mātuḥ striyāḥ
kope\'pi na me hānir iti bhāvaḥ \|\|28\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **jagad** iti \| **jagato jananyāṁ** mātari
lakṣmyām \| **vaiśasaṁ** citta-vyathā viśasana-tulyatvāt \| **yasyāḥ
karmaṇi** caraṇa-sevāyāṁ **samīhitam** \| samyag vāñchā \| na tu
svasyālpakatvaṁ matvā balavad virodhāt bibheṣi cet tarhi viramyatām
asmād iti cet, tatrāha---**karoṣi** iti \| tvaṁ hi dīneṣu pakṣapātitvāt
pragalbham api sevakaṁ sva-saṁsargāt pṛthak karoṣi \| śrīr evātra
nidarśanam iti bhāvaḥ \| tathāpi tasyāḥ prema-mātratve nātyantaṁ
sukha-sādhanatvāt \| tava ca bhṛtya-mātratvena bahiraṅgatvād ayuktaḥ \|
tayā saha virodha iti cet, tatrāha---**sva eva** iti \| strī-pramāṇeṣv
anya-puruṣeṣv eṣā vārtā \| na tu
nitya-niratiśayānanda-ghana-brahma-svarūpa-sukha-santuṣṭe tvayi iti
bhāvaḥ \| **dhiṣṇyaṁ** padam \|\|28\|\| \[mu.pha. 19.8\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** \[prīti-sandarbha 175\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

> kṛpāṁ tasya samāśritya prauḍhāṁ nānyam apekṣate \|
>
> atulāṁ yo vahan kṛṣṇe prītiṁ vīraḥ sa ucyate \[bha.ra.si. 3.2.53\]

iti vīra-bhaktocitaṁ sva-svabhāvaṁ prakaṭayann āha---**jagaj-jananyāṁ**
jagan-madhya-vittatvena mamāpi jananyāṁ lakṣmyāṁ **vaiśasaṁ** virodhaḥ
**syād eva** \| kutaḥ ? **yasyāḥ** **karmaṇi naḥ samīhitam** icchā, sā
khalu yuṣmad-vakṣasy āsīnā virājatu \| ahaṁ putra eva sarvaṁ
yuṣmac-caraṇa-paricaraṇaṁ karavāṇi, tasyāḥ ko'yam āgraho yat paricaraṇaṁ
vinā na jīvatīti bhāvaḥ \|

nanu, tvam arvācīnaḥ sātiprācīnā \| tvaṁ nikṛṣṭaḥ sātimahatīti tayā saha
kiṁ viruddhyase ? satyam, tathāpīndra-virodhe mat-pakṣapātavad atrāpi
mayi tava pakṣa-pāta eva syād ity āha---**phalgu** tuccham **api** tvam
**uru karoṣi**, yato **dīneṣu vatsalaḥ** \|

nanu, tvaṁ tasyāḥ kopān na bibheṣi kim ? tatra satyam, na bibhemīty
āha---**sva** eva **dhiṣṇye** sva-sāmarthye'bhiratasya mama tayā kiṁ? na
kim apīty arthaḥ \| tat-kṛpodreka eva mama sāmarthyam\| yad uktaṁ
vīra-bhaktodāharaṇeṣu---

> pralamba-ripur īśvaro bhavatu kā kṛtis tena me
>
> kumāra-makara-dhvajād api na kiñcid āste phalam \|
>
> kim anyad aham uddhataḥ prabhu-kṛpā-kaṭākṣa-śriyā
>
> priyā pariṣad-agrimāṁ na gaṇayāmi bhāmām api \|\| \[bha.ra.si.
> 3.2.54\] iti \|

dhiṣṇyaḥ śaktau ca pāvake iti puṁskānde'mara-dattaḥ \|\|28\|\|

**viśvanāthaḥ** \[bhakti-rasāmr̥ta-sindhu 3.2.55\]: **jagaj-jananyām**
iti pṛthu-vacanam \| he **jagadīśa** ! **jagaj-jananyāṁ** lakṣmyāṁ mama
**vaiśasam** aparādhaḥ **syād eva** \| tatra hetuḥ---**yasyāḥ** lakṣmyāḥ
caraṇa-sevā-rūpa-**karmaṇi** **no**'smākaṁ **samīhitaṁ**, ata eva
dravyābhilāṣitvāt virodho bhaviṣyaty eva \| nanu sā bhagavat-preyasī
parama-śreṣṭhā \| tvam arvācīna-dāsaḥ parama-nyūnaḥ \| kathaṁ tvayā saha
virodha-sambhāvanāpi ? ity ataḥ āha---**karoṣi** iti \| **phalgu**
atituccham **api uru** sarvato'dhikaṁ **karoṣi** \| ataḥ tvaṁ
**dīna-vatsalaḥ** \| **sve svarūpe dhiṣṇye** sthāne **abhiratasya** tava
\| **tayā** lakṣmyā \|\|55\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.29 \|\|**

**bhajanty atha tvām ata eva sādhavo**

**vyudasta-māyā-guṇa-vibhramodayam \|**

**bhavat-padānusmaraṇād ṛte satāṁ**

**nimittam anyad bhagavan na vidmahe \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :** athānyac ca \| ataḥ vātsalyād
eva \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** yatas tvaṁ dīna-vatsalo'taḥ
sādhavo niṣkāmāḥ, atha jñānānantaram api tvāṁ bhajanti \| kathaṁ bhūtam
? **māyā-guṇānāṁ vibhramo** vilāsas tasya **udayaḥ** kāryaṁ, sa
**nirasto** yasmiṁs tam \| te kim-arthaṁ bhajanti ?
tatrāha---**bhavat-padānusmaraṇād vinā'nyat** teṣāṁ **nimittaṁ** phalaṁ
**na vidmaḥ** \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** *kāryaṁ* vara-spṛhā
tvad-bhajanasyaivāyaṁ svabhāvo yad vara-spṛhā nivartata iti \|
anusmaraṇasyaiva sarva-sukha-cūḍāmaṇes tad-itara-sukha-tiraskārakatvād
iti bhāvaḥ \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** ata eva devatāntaraṁ hitvā mahāntas tvām eva
sevanta ity āha---**bhajanti** iti \| bhajyābhajya-nirdhāraṇānantaram \|
ata eveti dīna-vatsalatvāt svarūpa-sukha-santuṣṭatvāc ca tad
evāha---**vyudasta-** iti \| **vyudasto** dūrīkṛto **māyā-guṇānāṁ**
rajaḥ-prabhṛtīnāṁ **vibhramo** vilāso hi kāryaṁ rāga-dveṣādi, tasya
**udayo** hy āvirbhāvo yena tam \| kim-arthaṁ bhajanti ? iti cet
tatrāha---**bhavat-pada**- iti \| **bhavat-padānusmaraṇam** eva
**satāṁ** nimittaṁ nānyat kiñcit \|
nitya-niratiśayānandānubhava-rūpatvāt tasya iti bhāvaḥ \|\|29\|\|
\[mu.pha. 19.9\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** ata eveti \| dīna-vātsalyam eva
mukhyam uddīpanam ity arthaḥ \| sādhavaḥ projjhita-kaitavāḥ \| tad
evāvadhārayati---bhavad iti \| **ṛte** ity uktvāpy **anyad** ity uktir
avadhāraṇārthā \|\|29\|\|

**prīti-sandarbha (42)**: ṭīkā ca---yatas tvaṁ dīna-vatsalaḥ ata eva
sādhavo niṣkāmāḥ \| atha jñānānantaram api tvāṁ bhajanti \|
katham-bhūtam ? **māyā-guṇānāṁ vibhramo** vilāsaḥ tasya **udayaḥ**
kāryaṁ, sa **nirasto** yasmin, tam \| te kim-arthaṁ bhajanti ?
tatrāha---**bhavat-padānusmaraṇād vinā anyat** teṣāṁ **nimittaṁ** phalaṁ
**na vidmahe** \|\| ity eṣā \|\|29\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tad evaṁ na kevalam aham
eva, kintu sarva eva tvad-bhaktā varaṁ vṛṇvantīty āha---bhajanty atheti
\| yatas tvaṁ dīna-vatsalaḥ, ata eva bhajanti, **vyudasto** nirasto
bhavati **māyā-guṇānāṁ vibhramodayo** vividha-vara-spṛhā nivartata iti
\|

nanu tarhi bhajanasya kiṁ phalaṁ ? tatrāha---bhavad iti \| **nimittaṁ**
phalam **anusmaraṇasyaiva** sarva-sukha-cūḍāmaṇes
tad-itara-sukha-tiraskārakatvād iti bhāvaḥ \|\|29\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.30 \|\|**

**manye giraṁ te jagatāṁ vimohinīṁ**

**varaṁ vṛṇīṣveti bhajantam āttha yat \|**

**vācā nu tantyā yadi te jano'sitaḥ**

**kathaṁ punaḥ karma karoti mohitaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** varaiḥ kṛpālos tavānucitam ity
āśayenāha---manya iti \| **nu** aho **te** **vācā tantyā** yadi
**jano**'yam **asito**'baddhaḥ syāt, tarhi **punaḥ** punaḥ phalair
**mohitaḥ** san **kathaṁ karma karoti** ? \|\|30\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** nanu tarhy ahaṁ
sva-bhaktaṁ prati **varaṁ** **vṛṇīṣva** iti kathaṁ bravīmi ?
tatrāha---**manya** iti \| yadi kaścid apakvo bhaktas tvat-pralobhanād
varaṁ vṛṇute, tadaiva tasya bhakti-rasa-vañcanāt sarva-nāśa iti bhāvaḥ
\| karmaṇā pitṛ-lokaḥ svarga-kāmo yajeta ity-ādi-veda-lakṣaṇāpi **tava
vāg jagan-mohinī** ity āha \| **nu** aho \| **te vācā tantyā** **yadi**
**jano**\'yam **asito**\'baddha iti samānam \|\|30\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** evaṁ prasakto'nuprasaktyā nirūpya prakṛtam
anusandhatte---**manye girām** iti \| **bhajantaṁ** bhajanād eva
labdha-sarvotkarṣam \| **nu** aho te tava **vācāṁ** **tantryā**
paśu-bandhanī-tulyayā jano **yady asitaḥ** abaddhaḥ syāt \| tarhi
**kathaṁ punaḥ** punaḥ **karma karoti** ? dṛṣṭa-ripavo hi tad-bhajanaṁ
vihāya \|\|30\|\| \[mu.pha. 19.10\]

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu tarhy ahaṁ
sva-bhaktaṁ prati \"varaṁ vṛṇīṣva\" iti kathaṁ bravīmi ?
tatrāha---**manya** iti \| yadi kaścid apakvo bhaktas tvat-pralobhanāt
kam api varaṁ vṛṇute, tadaiva tasya bhakti-rasa-vañcanāt sarva-nāśa iti
bhāvaḥ \| sva-karmaṇā pitṛ-loka iti, svarga-kāmo'śvamedhaṁ yajeta
ity-ādi-veda-lakṣaṇāpi **tava vāg jagan-mohinī** ity āha---**nu** aho,
**te vācā tantryā** yadi **jano**'yam **asito** baddhaḥ syāt, tadā
**punaḥ** punaḥ **phalair mohitaḥ** san **kathaṁ karma karoti** ?
\|\|30\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.31 \|\|**

**tvan-māyayāddhā jana īśa khaṇḍito**

**yad anyad āśāsta ṛtātmano'budhaḥ \|**

**yathā cared bāla-hitaṁ pitā svayaṁ**

**tathā tvam evārhasi naḥ samīhitum \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tvan-māyayā** **khaṇḍitasya**
tvayā punaḥ khaṇḍanaṁ na kartavyam, kiṁ tu hitaṁ ceṣṭitavyam ity āha \|
tvan-māyayā **ṛtād ātmanas** tvattaḥ khaṇḍitaḥ pṛthak kṛto **yad**
yato'**nyat** putrādikam **āśāste** \| ataḥ **svayam** avijñāpita eva
**hitaṁ** ceṣṭitum **arhasi** \|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** īśeti \| niyantus tava
mama niyojyasya kā saṁmati-grahaṇa-cinteti bhāvaḥ \|\|31\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** yata evaṁ dṛṣṭa-vāg-vilāso bhavān, ato bhavatā
bhaktān praty evaṁ na vācyaṁ kintu pitṛvad dhitam eva vācyam ity
āha---**tvan-māyayā** iti \| **addhā** tattvataḥ \| **khaṇḍitaḥ**
pṛthak-kṛtaḥ \| **ṛtātmanaḥ** san padātma-rūpād **budhaḥ** dehe'haṁ
buddhiḥ san nānyad viṣaya-sukham **āśāste** vāñchati \| ataḥ sva-hitaṁ
na vetti \| ataḥ **svayam** eva **samīhituṁ** sva-hite ceṣṭayituṁ bhavān
**arhati** \| so'yaṁ prasannena bhagavatā dīyamāne svargāpavargādāv api
ūrjasvalatvād anabhiruceḥ pṛthor utsāha-sthāyi-bhāvaḥ
prakaraṇenāvagamyate \| na hi klība-cetasā tathā-vidhā varāḥ parihartuṁ
śakyāḥ \|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tvan-māyayā khaṇḍitasya tvayā
punaḥ khaṇḍanaṁ na kartavyam, kintu hitaṁ ceṣṭitavyam ity
āha---**tvan-māyayā** ṛtād ātmanas tvattaḥ **khaṇḍitaḥ** pṛthak kṛtaḥ
**yad** yato'**nyat** putrādikam **āśāste,** ataḥ **svayam** avijñāpita
eva **hitaṁ** ceṣṭitum **arhasi** \|\|31\|\|

**tvan-māyayāddhā jana īśa khaṇḍito**

**yad anyad āśāsta ṛtātmano'budhaḥ \|**

**yathā cared bāla-hitaṁ pitā svayaṁ**

**tathā tvam evārhasi naḥ samīhitum \|\|**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tasmāt tvaṁ vṛṇīṣveti
pralobhanena sva-bhakta-parīkṣām api na kuryā ity āha---tvad iti \|
janaḥ sarva eva yad yasmāt ṛtātmanaḥ satya-svarūpāt bhajanāt vastunaḥ
sakāśād anyadevāśāste no'smākaṁ tu tvan-mate yad bhadraṁ bhavati, tad
eva samīhituṁ ceṣṭitum arhasi \| yatheti bālasya hitāhitaṁ pitaiva
jānāti, bālas tv adhyayana-khelanādikaṁ sva-hitāhitaṁ viparyayeṇa
jānātīty evaṁ mahyaṁ varasya pradānam apradānaṁ vā hitaṁ vimṛśya
sva-sammatam eva bhadraṁ kriyatāṁ na punar mama sammatir eva
pramāṇīkartavyeti bhagavaty eva pṛthunā viśrambho vyañjitaḥ \|\|31\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.32 \|\|**

**maitreya uvāca---**

**ity ādi-rājena nutaḥ sa viśva-dṛk**

**tam āha rājan mayi bhaktir astu te \|**

**diṣṭyedṛśī dhīr mayi te kṛtā yayā**

**māyāṁ madīyāṁ tarati sma dustyajām \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** rājann iti \| rājñāṁ
durlabhāpi madbhaktirmatkṛpayāstv iti bhāvaḥ \|\|32\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** maitreya uvāca iti kvacin nāsti
ca, yathā pṛthoḥ śrīmad-bhagavad-bhakty-eka-niṣṭhā tathaiva
tenānyathānupadeśe viśvāsaś ca \| tathā śrī-bhagavato'pi
tad-eka-ditsaiva, tathāpy anyatra pravartanaṁ tu
tan-niṣṭhā-prakaṭanārthā, adhikār-viśeṣe tad-dvāraiva
jñānādi-pracāraṇārthaṁ ceti sphuṭam eva darśayati ity ādīti \| anyathā
jñānam astu te ity evocyeteti bhāvaḥ \| tataruḥ sudustarām iti kvacit
pāṭhaḥ \|\|32\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** bhagavān api
tathaivāha---mayi bhaktir ity ato jīvānāṁ sarvathā kiṁ hitam iti praśne
sarvajñair api veda-vādibhiḥ pratyuktaṁ jñāna-yogādikaṁ na viśvasanīyam
\| bhagavantam apekṣya teṣām apy ajñatvād iti bhakter eva hitatvaṁ
nānyasyeti siddhānto nirdhāritaḥ \|\|32\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.33 \|\|**

**tat tvaṁ kuru mayādiṣṭam apramattaḥ prajāpate \|**

**mad-ādeśa-karo lokaḥ sarvatrāpnoti śobhanam \|\|**

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** prajāpate iti \| rājñaḥ
prajāpālanam eva sarveṣṭadamatastad eva kāryam iti bhāvaḥ \| sarvatreha
paratra ca śobhanaṁ sukham \|\|33\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*na katamenāpi vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.34 \|\|**

**maitreya uvāca---**

**iti vainyasya rājarṣeḥ pratinandyārthavad vacaḥ \|**

**pūjito'nugṛhītvainaṁ gantuṁ cakre ñcyuto matim \|\|**

*na katamenāpi vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.35-36 \|\|**

**devarṣi-pitṛ-gandharva- siddha-cāraṇa-pannagāḥ \|**

**kinnarāpsaraso martyāḥ khagā bhūtāny anekaśaḥ \|\|**

**yajñeśvara-dhiyā rājñā vāg-vittāñjali-bhaktitaḥ \|**

**sabhājitā yayuḥ sarve vaikuṇṭhānugatās tataḥ \|\|**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**

bhūteṣu harir ity eva hary-arpaṇa-dhiyā tayā \|

> sarva-bhūteṣu ca hareḥ pūjā kāryātma-vedibhiḥ \|\| iti pādme
> \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** vāg-vittāñjalibhir bhaktitaḥ
pūjitāḥ santaḥ \| vaikuṇṭhānugatāḥ pārṣadāś ca \|\|36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** vaco varānvibho
tvad-varadeśvarāt ity-ādivākyajātam enaṁ pṛthum \|\| tato yajñapradeśāt
\|\|34-36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** devarṣīti yugmakam \|
vaikuṇṭhasyānugatāḥ sevāyamānāḥ pārṣadās tu tenaiva saha gamiṣyantīti
yogyatvāt \|\|35-36\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.37 \|\|**

**bhagavān api rājarṣeḥ sopādhyāyasya cācyutaḥ \|**

**harann iva mano'muṣya sva-dhāma pratyapadyata \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** amuṣya rājñaḥ \| harann iveti
lokoktiḥ \| vastutas tasya manaḥ sarva-daiva tad adhīnam asty eva \|
sva-dhāma rājño hṛdayam \|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** svadhāma vaikuṇṭham
\|\|37\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī
(sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

**\...**

**\|\| 4.20.38 \|\|**

**adṛṣṭāya namaskṛtya nṛpaḥ sandarśitātmane \|**

**avyaktāya ca devānāṁ devāya sva-puraṁ yayau \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** adṛṣṭāya locana-patham
atikrāntāya \| sandarśita ātmā yena tasmai \| vastuto'vyaktāya
\|\|38\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** adṛṣṭāyānyaiḥ \| pṛthustu
vaikuṇṭhagamanaparyantaṁ taṁ dadarśaivety arthaḥ \|\|38\|\|

iti śrīmad-bhāgavata-bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśe caturtha-skandhe
viṁśo\'dhyāyaḥ \|\|20\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** anyair adṛṣṭāya
sandarśitaḥ ātmā āśrayo yena tasmai iti vaikuṇṭha-gamana-paryantaṁ
pṛthu-stutaṁ dadarśaivety arthaḥ \|\|38\|\|

**\...**

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām \|

viṁśo'dhyāyaś caturthasya saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām \|\|\*\|\|

**\...**

> iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ
> saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ caturtha-skandhe
>
> pṛthu-carite pṛthu-stavo nāma
>
> viṁśo'dhyāyaḥ \|

\|\| 4.20 \|\|

śrī-śrī-madhvācārya-vijaya-dhvaja-tīrtha-vīrarāghavācāryādīnāṁ
pāṭhānusāreṇa śrīmad-bhāgavatasya atrādhyāya-śeṣe nimna-likhita-ślokau
atirikta-pāṭha-rūpeṇa upalabhyete---

te sādhu varṇitaṁ rājann āśāḥ se yad āśiṣaḥ \|

svargāpavarga-narakān samaḥ paśyati mat-paraḥ \|\|

prīto'haṁ te mahārāja roṣaṁ dustyajam atyajaḥ \|

mad-ādeśaṁ śraddadhānās tan mahyaṁ paramārhaṇam \|\|

**\...**

**(4.21)**

## 
**ekaviṁśo'dhyāyaḥ**

<details><summary>विषयः</summary>

svakīya-prajā-pariṣadi mahārāja-pṛthu-kṛta-bhagavad-dharmopadeśaḥ \|
</details>

**\|\| 4.21.1 \|\|**

**maitreya uvāca**

**mauktikaiḥ kusuma-sragbhir dukūlaiḥ svarṇa-toraṇaiḥ \|**

**mahā-surabhibhir dhūpair maṇḍitaṁ tatra tatra vai \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

eka-viṁśe tu pṛthunā prajānām anuśāsanam \|

mahā-satre surādīnāṁ mahā-sadasi varṇyate \|\|

puraṁ yayāv ity uktaṁ tat puram anuvarṇayati---mauktikair iti tribhiḥ
\|\|1\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** mauktikair iti trikam \|\|1\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

eka-viṁśe mahā-satre sarva-saundarya-maṇḍitaḥ \|

praśrayābdhiḥ pṛthur bhaktiṁ sva-prajāḥ samaśikṣayat \|\|

puraṁ yayāv ity uktaṁ tat puram anuvarṇayati---mauktikair iti tribhiḥ
\|\|1\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.2 \|\|**

**candanāguru-toyārdra- rathyā-catvara-mārgavat \|**

**puṣpākṣata-phalais tokmair lājair arcirbhir arcitam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** candanāguru-yuktais toyair ārdrā
rathyādayas tad yuktam \| tokmair harita-yavair aṅkurair iti vā \|
arcibhir dīpaiḥ \|\|2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tokmair ity atra stomair iti
citsukhaḥ \|\|2\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** mauktikādibhir yat yat
puraṁ maṇḍitaṁ tatra tatra yayāv iti pūrveṇaivānvayaḥ \| tokmair
harita-yavaiḥ arcita-dīpaiḥ \|\|2\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.3 \|\|**

**savṛndaiḥ kadalī-stambhaiḥ pūga-potaiḥ pariṣkṛtam \|**

**taru-pallava-mālābhiḥ sarvataḥ samalaṅkṛtam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** sa-vṛndaiḥ puṣpa-phala-yuktaiḥ
kadalī-stambhaiḥ pūgair vṛkṣais tathāvidhaiḥ sarvataḥ samalaṅkṛtaṁ
śobhitam \|\|3\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** savṛntaiḥ
phala-puṣpa-vṛnta-sahitaiḥ pūga-potair nūtana-guvāka-vṛkṣaiḥ \|\|3\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.4 \|\|**

**prajās taṁ dīpa-balibhiḥ sambhṛtāśeṣa-maṅgalaiḥ \|**

**abhīyur mṛṣṭa-kanyāś ca mṛṣṭa-kuṇḍala-maṇḍitāḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** saṁbhṛtāny aśeṣāṇi maṅgalāni
dadhyādīni taiḥ sahābhijagmuḥ \| mṛṣṭā ujjvalāḥ kanyāś ca \|\|4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** mahāsatre dīrghayajñe \|
taṁ pṛthum \|\|1-4\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nirmañchanārthaṁ
dīpa-balibhiḥ sampūrṇāśeṣa-maṅgalair dadhy-ādibhiḥ sahitāḥ \|
mṛṣṭa-kanyāḥ mārjita-pātrāḥ kumārikāḥ \| mṛṣṭa-kuṇḍaleti
tad-upalakṣitojjvala-vastrālaṅkāra-yuktāḥ \|\|4\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.5 \|\|**

**śaṅkha-dundubhi-ghoṣeṇa brahma-ghoṣeṇa cartvijām \|**

**viveśa bhavanaṁ vīraḥ stūyamāno gata-smayaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** gata-smayo nirahaṅkāraḥ
\|\|5\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :**
nirahaṅkārastādṛśamasādhāraṇamaiśvaryaṁ svasya vīkṣyāpi gatagarvaḥ
\|\|5\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** gata-smayaḥ svasya
tādṛśam asādhāraṇam aiśvaryaṁ vīkṣyāpi vigata-garva ity arthaḥ \|\|5\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.6 \|\|**

**pūjitaḥ pūjayām āsa tatra tatra mahā-yaśāḥ \|**

**paurā' jānapadāṁs tāṁs tān prītaḥ priya-vara-pradaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** priyān varān pradadātīti tathā
\|\|6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** pūjitaḥ
svarṇamudrānardhya̍navavastrādyupāyanapradānenety arthaḥ \| pūjayāmāsa sa
uṣṇīṣakaṁcukanepālakaṁbalādipratidānenety arthaḥ \|\|6\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** pūjitaḥ paurādibhiḥ
svarṇa-mudrānarghya-navya-vastrādy-upāyanārpaṇenety arthaḥ \| pūjayāmāsa
sa uttīrṇa-kañcukoṣṇīṣādi-pratidānenety arthaḥ \|\|6\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.7 \|\|**

**sa evam-ādīny anavadya-ceṣṭitaḥ**

**karmāṇi bhūyāṁsi mahān mahattamaḥ \|**

**kurvan śaśāsāvani-maṇḍalaṁ yaśaḥ**

**sphītaṁ nidhāyāruruhe paraṁ padam \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** guṇair mahān ata eva mahattamaḥ
pūjyatamaḥ \|\|7\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** ata eva guṇairmahattvād
eva \|\|7\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** mahān mahattama iti
uttama-madhyama-kaniṣṭhatayā trividheṣu mahattameṣu madhye uttamo
mahattama ity arthaḥ \|\|7\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.8 \|\|**

**sūta uvāca---**

**tad ādi-rājasya yaśo vijṛmbhitaṁ**

**guṇair aśeṣair guṇavat-sabhājitam \|**

**kṣattā mahā-bhāgavataḥ sadaspate**

**kauṣāraviṁ prāha gṛṇantam arcayan \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** guṇair vijṛmbhitam ūrjitaṁ
guṇavadbhiḥ sabhājitaṁ sat-kṛtaṁ yaśo gṛṇantam arcayan prāha \| sadasaḥ
pate śaunaka \|\|8\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** sadasaḥ sabhāyāḥ pate
sabhāpatitvena pūjyatvāttvāmahamidaṁ varṇaye \| kiñcedam eva sadaspateḥ
śobhanam iti bhāvaḥ \|\|8\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam.*

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** guṇavadbhiḥ sabhājitaṁ
satkṛtaṁ yaśo gṛṇantam \| he sadaspate śaunaka \|\|8\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.9 \|\|**

**vidura uvāca**---

**so'bhiṣiktaḥ pṛthur viprair labdhāśeṣa-surārhaṇaḥ \|**

**bibhrat sa vaiṣṇavaṁ tejo bāhvor yābhyāṁ dudoha gām \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** labdhāny aśeṣa-surāṇām arhaṇāni
yena saḥ \| kim akarod iti śeṣaḥ \|\|9\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** vaiṣṇavaṁ tejaḥ sudarśanaṁ
tvaṁ tejaḥ pauruṣaṁ param ityaṁbarīṣokteḥ \| viṣṇuḥ sudarśanaṁ cakraṁ
tatpatnyavyāhatāṁ śriyam ity abhiṣekottaramupāyanākhyānokteḥ \|
kadācidvāmakare\'pi taddhāraṇādvāhvor iti dvivacanam \| anyathā bāhāvity
evaṁ kathaṁ nāvādīti manīṣibhiretena kalpanāntaranivṛttirapyasūci
\|\|9\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** bibhrac ca vaiṣṇavam iti \|
gauṇapāṭhaḥ sa ity atra tu paunaruktyaṁ lakṣyate \|\|9\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** bāhvor bibhrad abhūt
\|\|9\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.10 \|\|**

**ko nv asya kīrtiṁ na śṛṇoty abhijño**

**yad-vikramocchiṣṭam aśeṣa-bhūpāḥ \|**

**lokāḥ sa-pālā upajīvanti kāmam**

**adyāpi tan me vada karma śuddham \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** śravaṇautsukyam āviṣkurvan
prārthayate---ko nv iti \| yasya vikramaḥ pṛthvī-dohanaṁ
tasyocchiṣṭa-tulyaṁ kāmam \| tat tasya karma vada \|\|10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** sarvakāmānāṁ
pṛthvīdugdhatvātpṛthvīdohanasya tadvikramakṛtatvād ity arthaḥ \|\|10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** yad vikrameti \| yena vikramya
upāttaṁ tad ucchiṣṭam evety arthaḥ \|\|10\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** yasya vikrameṇa ucchiṣṭam
iti sarveṣāṁ kāmānāṁ pṛthvī-dugdhatvāt pṛthvī-dohanasya yad
vikrama-kṛtatvād ity arthaḥ \|\|10\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.11 \|\|**

**maitreya uvāca---**

**gaṅgā-yamunayor nadyor antarā kṣetram āvasan \|**

**ārabdhān eva bubhuje bhogān puṇya-jihāsayā \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** prācīna-karmabhiḥ prārabdhān eva
bubhuje, natu bhogāntarārthaṁ karmāṇi karoti, tad api bhogena
puṇya-kṣapaṇecchayā, natu sukhāsaktyety arthaḥ \|\|11\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** ity artha iti \| vastutas
tu prārabdhabhogādikaṁ lokadṛṣṭyaiva, tasya bhagavatāratvānna
prārabdhabhogādīti bhāvaḥ \| antarā kṣetraṁ madhyavartideśam \|\|11\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** ārabdhān eveti matveti
śeṣaḥ \| yadyapi bhagavad-avatāratvena bhaktatvena ca na tasya
prārabdhaṁ karma, tathāpi bhakti-bhūmnātidainyena prākṛta-jīva evāhaṁ
sukha-duḥkhābhyām puṇya-pāpe jihāsāmīti tad-abhimāno jñeyaḥ \|\|11\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.12 \|\|**

**sarvatrāskhalitādeśaḥ sapta-dvīpaika-daṇḍa-dhṛk \|**

**anyatra brāhmaṇa-kulād anyatrācyuta-gotrataḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** askhalito'pratihata ādeśa ājñā
yasya \| saptasu dvīpeṣv eka eva daṇḍaṁ dhārayatīti tathā \| kiṁ
sarvatra, nety āha \| brāhmaṇa-kula-vyatir ekeṇa \| acyuto
gotra-pravartaka-tulyo yeṣāṁ vaiṣṇavānāṁ tad vyatir ekeṇa ca \|\|12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** vaiṣṇavānāṁ
varṇāśramābhāvo dhvanita iti cakravartī \| granthāntare tu---

> strīṇāṁ syātpatigotratvaṁ pāṇigrahaṇato yathā \|
>
> nṛṇāmacyuta gotratvamacyutāśrayaṇāttathā \|\|
>
> santyajya vidhivatsarvaṁ putradāragṛhādikam \|
>
> ātmānaṁ yadbhajedviṣṇumacyutāśrayaṇaṁ hi tat \|\| iti vaiṣṇavāt \|

vidhivad ity ukteḥ saṁnyāso lakṣyate \|
yadvā---vidhivacchāstravihitācāryayathādhikāramantragrahaṇavidhinety
arthaḥ \| na tu jātyādivyutkramaṇena mantragrahaṇādi kāryam iti bhāvaḥ
\| askhalitājñaḥ \| yattu cakravartinā vaiṣṇavānāṁ varṇāśramābhāvo
dhvanitastannāradasanakādiṣu vipradvijottamādiśabdaprayogasya svāgataṁ
bho dvijaśreṣṭhāḥ, yasya viprāḥ prasīdanti ity-ādipṛthūkteḥ \|
kiñcārjunādimahābhāgavateṣu kṣattriyabāhujādiprayogadarśanāc ca tathā
naiṣṭhikāḥ sanakādayaḥ, tathā vavre, bṛhadvrataṁ māṁ tu iti nāradokteḥ
\| karmabhirgṛhamedhīyaiḥ ity-ādiyudhiṣṭhirādyukteś ca
varṇāśramābhimānaśravaṇādavaiṣṇavatvaprasakteścityam \|\|12\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** acyuta eva gotraṁ
pravartaka-tulyo yeṣāṁ tebhyaś ceti vaiṣṇavāṇāṁ varṇāśramābhāvo
vyañjitaḥ \| anyatreti brāhmaṇānāṁ śāstvatve tat-tad-vedācāryam eva
vaiṣṇavānāṁ tu tat-tan-mantra-gurum eva śāntvatve vyavasthāpyety arthaḥ
\| putrāṁś ca śiṣyāṁś nṛpo gurur vā

mal-loka-kāmo mad-anugrahārthaḥ \| itthaṁ vimanyur anuśiṣyāt \[bhā.pu.
5.5.15\] iti ṛṣabhokteḥ \|\|12\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.13 \|\|**

**ekadāsīn mahā-satra- dīkṣā tatra divaukasām \|**

**samājo brahmarṣīṇāṁ ca rājarṣīṇāṁ ca sattama \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ekadā tasya mahā-satra-dīkṣā
āsīt tatra satre devādīnāṁ samāja āsīd ity arthaḥ \|\|13\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** sattameti \| yathā tvaṁ
satsamājamīhase tathā pṛthurapyāsīd iti bhāvaḥ \| yajñe veṣe sadādāne
satramācchādane nave iti \|\|13\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** ekadā tasya
mahā-satra-dīkṣā āsīt, tatra satre devānāṁ samāja āsīt \|\|13\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.14 \|\|**

**tasminn arhatsu sarveṣu svarciteṣu yathārhataḥ \|**

**utthitaḥ sadaso madhye tārāṇām uḍurāḍ iva \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** tasmin pūjyeṣv arciteṣu satsu
sadaso madhye utthitaḥ san samantataḥ samaikṣateti ṣaṣṭhenānvayaḥ
\|\|14\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** tasminsatre, arhatsu
pūjyeṣu arhantau jinasaṁmānyau iti yādavaḥ \| uḍurāṭ candraḥ \|\|14\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** tasminn iti sārdha-ṣaṭkam
\|\|14\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** arhatsu pūjyeṣu ṛṣy-ādiṣu
kiñcid vijñāpanārtham utthitaḥ san samaikṣateti ṣaṣṭhenānvayaḥ
\|\|14\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.15 \|\|**

**prāṁśuḥ pīnāyata-bhujo gauraḥ kañjāruṇekṣaṇaḥ \|**

**sunāsaḥ sumukhaḥ saumyaḥ pīnāṁsaḥ sudvija-smitaḥ \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** prāṁśur unnataḥ \| pīnāv āyatau
bhujau yasya, kañja-vada-ruṇe īkṣaṇe yasya, śobhanā dvijāḥ smitaṁ ca
yasya \|\|15\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :**
sāmudrikoktamahārājalakṣaṇavattvena pṛthuṁ varṇayati---prāṁśur iti \|
pīnau pīvarau \| āyatau laṁbau \| dvijā dantāḥ \|\|15\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** *na vyākhyātam***.**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** prāṁśur unnataḥ
\|\|15\|\|

**\...**

**\|\| 4.21.16 \|\|**

**vyūḍha-vakṣā bṛhac-chroṇir vali-valgu-dalodaraḥ \|**

**āvarta-nābhir ojasvī kāñcanorur udagra-pāt \|\|**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** vyūḍhaṁ vistīrṇaṁ vakṣo yasya,
valibhis tisṛbhir valgu sundaraṁ dalavad adho'gram aśvattha-patram iva
upari vistṛtam adhastāt saṅkucitam udaraṁ yasya, āvartavan nimnā nābhir
yasya, kāñcana-vad-ujjvalāv ūrū yasya, udagrāv unnatāgrau pādau yasya
\|\|16\|\|

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**vaṁśīdharaḥ (bhāvārtha-dīpikā-prakāśaḥ) :** bṛhantau śroṇīnitambau
